title: Eureka J20 Robot Vacuum and Mop with Self Emptying Base, Self Emptying Robot Vacuum, 8000Pa Suction, Auto Mop Washing & Hot Air Drying,3D Obstacle Avoidance, Cycling Belt-Mop Design
description: We know you value a clean home and Eureka is proud to offer whole home cleaning solutions to make life a little easier.

【RollRenew™ Mopping System】Continuous mop cleaning for continuously clean mopping. Innovative cycling belt-mop design coordinates with a robot-integrated dual water tank system to continuously rinse the mop, remove dirty water, scrubs floors with a robust 17N of downward pressure to totally remove tough dirt and messy spills.

【All-in-One Base Station for Hassle-Free Cleaning】Eureka J20 robot vacuum offers auto emptying, auto mop washing & drying (with warm 113℉air,) auto clean water refilling & dirty water collection, auto detergent dispensing. Experience hassle-free cleaning with this all-in-one powerhouse, designed for automated and effortless maintenance.

【8,000Pa Powerful Suction, No Dirt Left Behind】With an impressive 8,000Pa max suction, the Eureka J20 effortlessly extracts embedded dust and dirt from deep within carpets, delivering a truly spotless clean. Featuring 4 adjustable suction levels, it allows you to customize your cleaning experience, while the suction boost function enhances performance on carpets for a deeper, more thorough clean. Refresh your floors like never before.

【DuoDetect AI™ Obstacle Identification】No environment is too cluttered to navigate. Equipped with advanced AI dual-view structured light, the J20 commercial robotic vacuum navigates cluttered spaces with precision. It efficiently identifies obstacles and generates optimal cleaning paths, ensuring a smarter, more effective clean around furniture and other impediments.

【Ultrasonic Carpet Detection with Smart Mop Adjustment】Keep carpets dry and spotless. The J20 robot automatically detects carpets and intelligently flips the mop to the non-absorbent side, ensuring seamless cleaning without moisture on carpets.

【LiDAR Mapping & Precision Navigation】Advanced LiDAR navigation allows J20 to rapidly map your home and identify areas to clean, planning cleaning paths and moving in neat rows to provide ecient navigation for effective cleaning. A large onboard battery delivers a max runtime of 130 minutes to clean up to 3,230ft on a single charge.
If you have any questions,contact our customer service team at 1-800-282-2886
